title: Kakuma News Reflector
subtitle: In the matter of consideration by the National Assembly, the Refugee Bill No. 62/2019 is planned for public hearing in #Kakuma on Nov 9, 2019 at Silga Valley Restaurant from 10AM – 5PM. We are informing the refugees & members of the host community to attend this important forum. pic.twitter.com/O7Nqwwk9ZE
